comment: She is very kind; however, she is a very tough grader. In all honesty, I feel discouraged when I read her assignment feedback/when I get grades way lower than what I believe I deserve. Her D2L is very confusing and formatted in a strange way, there's no content tab. Very easy to miss assignments. If I had a choice, I wouldn't take her again.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: I agree with the review before mine, she was a very tough grader and had a lot of nit-picky tendencies when grading work. It was very stressful for it to just be a mini-mester. I would not take!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Lots and lots of reading. 60% of your grade is in 2 writing assignments which she grades very harshly. D2L is set up in a confusing way because there is no contents tab. If you are taking this class as an elective or schedule filler, take someone else!! Lots of texts that you have to buy yourself. Otherwise, fine class with interesting content.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: For this class to be a minimester she was such a tough grader. She also has the class page set up differently than I have ever seen it. I would go with a no for this class

I do not recommend Dr Guglielmo and would suggest avoiding her at all costs. She did not seem to care about her students and had a very narrow mindset. She did not support creativity and views her way of writing/thinking as the only correct way. I have never had a professor who disliked my writing for seemingly no reason before as she did.

Professor Guglielmo was incredible! She is straightforward about what needs to be done each week, though she allows you to skip a few discussion boards with no questions asked. Coursework mostly involves reading from two textbooks, participating in discussions, and writing a few papers. Overall, I highly recommend taking her class!

a very understanding prof. when it comes to late work. lots and LOTS of reading from the textbook that i don't think were necessary. loved how she spaced out due dates for work, it gave me a lot of time to edit. if you don't plan on going into an English field this class is  not needed at all. no final exam just a final paper

Dr. Guglielmo was okay. She required a bit much but was there when you needed assistance, answered her emails in a timely manner. If you don't like to read, don't take her lol. You need all the textbooks that are required. She set the course up with modules. There are quite a few papers. No final exam but the papers hold a lot of weight.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: the textbook is $10, class is optional, responded quickly, very little work. I have come to all the lectures because I have enjoyed his class so much. Free thinker, never judges, cares, he just wants you to question the world. Spent an hour a week on homework. I really cant express how great this class is and he is! Do the little work, make an A

This class was a waste of my time. The course is unorganized, and she required way too much work for a 2000 level class. Her instructions were non-specific, and gave us so many things to read/watch for no particular purpose. The discussions were not good, and I'm literally a gender and women's studies minor and I did not enjoy her course at all.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: The thing that made me hate this class was her main project, incredibly involved and required community service. I have nothing against it, but as a full-time college kid, with a job, it was hard to find time for it. It was too much for an entry-level course. It makes sense for a 3000 or 4000 class, but for a 2000 class, I felt it was too much.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: Please avoid this professor at all costs. Extremely tough grader and makes you feel like you're incapable when you actually are capable.

If you have the chance, take Dr. Guglielmo! She is a brilliant professor and is so passionate about the subject matter. She really makes it fun to engage with the text. You have to read a lot and genuinely put effort into the assignments, but as long as you don't slack you will be fine.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Best professor I've ever had! I had to take an upper-level ENGL/GWST course and was SO glad I chose Dr. G's class. It inspired me to take more GWST courses. She is so passionate and helpful. The workload seemed scary at first, but she made the material so engaging & easy to grasp! I almost took leave from my job to take another one of her classes.

Absolutely love her! Subject is hard, but she makes it easier. Very understanding and helpful. Willing to meet with you and work with you to help you grasp the topics. Very intelligent and insightful. She's a great orator and treats all opinions with respect. Seriously, just take her; you won't regret it.

Dr. Guglielmo is very sweet and helpful. The class itself is difficult but she tries to help you understand it. There are reading responses, a final project (the hardest thing I've ever done), midterm, and final. She is a tough grader but if you ask for help she's happy to help you. I would recommend her but get ready to work.

HORRIBLE professor. Tough Grader, no help on papers or projects and is not clear on assignments for grades. If you want to pass or guidance stay clear of her!  Run away now and avoid her at any cost. Crazy how 3 other classes this semester and papers were all 95% and above (wrote about 20 research responses) but she grades mine as 60%!

Professor G is very interested in what she teaches and it shows. I've taken 2 GWST classes with her so far and I wish she taught more of them! Yes, she actually grades your papers (which is what other commenters are referring to as "grading hard") but it is a college class. Only kindergarten teachers give grades just for doing the assignment.

Do not, and I mean it, do not take her! When writing my papers she would say that I was doing well and then give me a low grade. She even used my paper to tell the class what "not to do". It is weird since other professors like my work so I don't know what is wrong. She will not even tell people what they did wrong.
WOW! do NOT take her for study abroad!!! she assigned SOOOO much work! projects..etc. not worth the effort!!!!

I took her online during the Spring. This was my first online class so I was a little skeptical. Professor G made my first experience the best. Yeah she grades hard, but it's college. HSe is really helpful and is willing to set up a time to meet with you if you need extra help.

Dr G is really nice, but she grades hard. There are four essays in the semester, but she grades them extremely hard. The great thing about her is that she schedules one on one appointments with her students to go over their rough drafts. Good teacher overall, I just wish she graded a little easier.
She was a good teachers very helpful. Class was not too much fun but only four papers during the sestmer.

Prof Guglielmo is AMAZING! I would say the BEST English teacher I have ever had! She is more than willing to help her students if she can. Hard class, must keep up with your reading and you will do fine! Take her if you can!
Honors level comp class. Lots of great class discussions. Interesting professor.

An easy class. She gives you opportunities to conference with her throughout the semester and all assignments were pretty easy. She is an easy grader. The final project is a little tedious, but she is very helpful. Definitely take her!

she is extremely helpful. most of the points came from posting to the discussion board which was easy and she gave ample time for posting. 3 rough drafts which u brought to calss for peer review 2 mini papers and an overall project and presentation. gives great guidelines which tells you how to recieve an A. highly recommend. would deff take again
ONLINE CLASS= EASY, SHE OFFERS LOTS OF HELP. SHE ROCKS

Very nice, very helpful. Class is definitely worth going to, she does something important or useful each time. She'll help you one-on-one for all of your papers so you know what to do to get an A. Not too much reading and only 3 papers to write, but you'll learn a lot and be a better writer by the end of the semester. You should totally take her!!!
Best English teacher I have ever had. Most of my 1101 class is taking her for the 1102.
Very helpful and down to earth. Best teacher I have had in a while. The class was easy and suprinsingly enjoyable.

She is a very good teacher, cares about your performance in the class.  The assignments are pretty easy for the most part, and she always leaves the door open for help.  She grades fairly and will dissect your papers word by word.  Take her!
Took on-line course. Quite simple, stay on top of assignments and it's an easy hope-keeper. Didn't really learn anything, didn't use the book at all, except for MLA formatting.
I had her for 1101 and 1102.. she was such an amazing teacher and so willing to help. She cares very much about her students. She explains everything so well and is very organized. Take her!
Very good at her job. Tries to give a modern adaptation of every book you read. Example Forrest Gump for Candide! She also is very pretty lady! Stop reading this and sign up for her class!

very cool teacher.  uses subjects students are interested in to teach.  used facebook and myspace articles to teach a writing technique.  also easy to communicate with and requires two meetings with her during the semester.

Very good teacher. Shes very organized ans willing to help. We had four papers for the whole semester, and she grades a little hard, but she will definitely help you if you get a conference with her. I would recommend her if you are willing to do what is required.

I enjoyed being in her class. I think she is a great teacher, and she does a really good job of incorporating everyday life into her teaching. The essays are easy to do, but she grades kind of strict. I would definately recommend taking her class though.
Great teaching stlye. Keeps things interesting.  Really organized step by step.
She is an ok teacher.. gives no homework... essays seem easy but she grades them very hard.... There is an attendece policy.. i would recommend her buttttttttt you better be smart
She was really nice and a somewhat interesting teacher. We watched a lot of movies during the summer and had to read parts of only five books. I recommend her to anyone!

Great teacher. Very conserate with your time. Splits the class into two groups. Say on Mon the entire class meets for info on the book we're reading, then Wed group A meets, and then Mon group B meets. You only have to go 1/3 of the time! All you do is read the books, which isn't that easy with the time given. As long as you're in class ..continued

She is so nice and made writing papers fun! I loved that she let us peer grade. She always gave me good suggestions and was very understanding. She is young and engages the class, and is friendly outside of class as well!

I cannot believe that this teacher is getting such high ratings.  She is nice and everything and her class is okay, but do not ask her for help.  I told her at the beginning of the semester for help b/c I had to get an 'A' to keep HOPE and she gave me a 89 'B' and made me loose HOPE! She's horrible

I took her for all three of the gen ed English classes and got an A in every class.  I really like Ms. G because she's nice, helpful, laid back, and her tests in ENGL 2110 were comprehensive, but not difficult.

REALLY nice lady. EASY EASY EASY! I have never made an A in eglish in my life, not even elem school but I got an A in her's. She is really helpful and will talk to you about your other classes. She really does care.

Ms. Guglielmo is as sweet as can be! Always willing to help and clarify with excellent examples. She is very fair. She lets us get our papers peer edited by classmates during class. I highly recommend Ms. G. It has been a pleasure to be in her class so far and I'm hoping to take her next semester fo
Ms. Guglielmo is one of the best English teachers I've had. She's very helpful and makes the class enjoyable.
Fun class
Haven't taken her class, but seen her around.  WOW, what a hottie!  She has to be the best looking prof around.  Don't know how her class is, but take her just for the view
She was a very sweet person but the class was VERY boring and impossible to stay interested in.
No Comments
No Comments
she is awesome! very organized and helpful. the best english teacher i have ever had!
